titles.title: To make permanent certain authority relating to self-employment assistance programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/8/1995--Introduced. Amends the North American Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act to repeal provisions which terminate certain authority for self-employment assistance programs after a specified period (thus making such authority permanent). Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow States to use unemployment insurance funds for short-term compensation programs under certain conditions.
